meanings.definition: A person who gives warning or advice.
meanings.sent1: The warners told us about the storm approaching.
meanings.sent2: The warners in the neighborhood always keep us informed about safety.
meanings.sent3: The warners made sure we knew not to play near the construction site.
meanings.sent4: The warners were like beacons of caution in the community.
meanings.sent5: The warners' words echoed in our minds, guiding us to safety.

meanings.definition: A device or signal that warns or alerts.
meanings.sent1: The warners on the alarm system went off when there was a fire.
meanings.sent2: The warners on the road signs helped drivers stay safe.
meanings.sent3: The warners on the doorbell made a funny sound when someone approached.
meanings.sent4: The warners on the weather app predicted a storm coming our way.
meanings.sent5: The warners' red lights flashed urgently, signaling danger ahead.
